name: The Calamity Chapter - Demo Concept
description:
The Calamity Chapter is a block out concept of a game I developed centered around the story of The Last Of Us Part 1.

The Calamity Chapter is a Last Of Us inspired story line for the PS5, following a scientist called Dr Arnold Tavik, who has been tasked to enter nearby cities and collect blood samples of civilians who are infected, but haven’t fully turned. Set just a week after the first infection, the American army has been tasked to bomb major cities, in hope to decrease the population of those infected, however, Dr Arnold Tavik has a theory, that he may be able to reverse engineer the diseases process if he can grab pure blood samples of those beginning their infection.

The world is in a state of panic… Cities overrun, families destroyed. Do you have what it takes to enter hell, and make it out of the gates alive?
